reviewText:
U. S. soap queen Pat Bedford (Julie Walters) is the biggest thing on American television.  Margaret is a waitress in a motorway cafeteria.  She lives in a bedsit above a shop in Lancashire.  Sisters, separated for 27 years, are reunited live on British national television much to their surprise and Pat's horror.  Pat protests that she "can't be seen to have a blood relative with a Lancashire accent and a perm you could go trick-or-treating in."

But, in the glare of the tabloid press, Pat has no choice but to play along.

THIS IS A REGION 2 PAL DISK WHICH REQUIRES A REGION 2 OR REGION-FREE DVD PLAYER CAPABLE OF CONVERTING PAL SIGNAL TO NTSC.
